title: 大家认为N卡开光影好还是A卡开光影好？
author: StarTrek
txt_content: 最近准备换一张显卡，为了光影已经准备许久，大家说说用什么卡好

replies.author: Li_Hii
replies.txt_content: 蓝宝石RX580

replies.author: StarTrek
replies.txt_content: 那RX580那个版本，有4G.8G等等，那个好一些

replies.author: rooke_zb
replies.txt_content:
要是以前的话这游戏的大部分光影都是A卡黑，现在大多数都兼容A卡了

别问，问就2080ti

replies.author: StarTrek
replies.txt_content: 除非老黄把2080降价到2000...

replies.author: Li_Hii
replies.txt_content:
StarTrek 发表于 2019-3-1 23:01
那RX580那个版本，有4G.8G等等，那个好一些
当然显存大那个好

replies.author: monseasd
replies.txt_content: 2080ti警告

replies.author: Li_Hii
replies.txt_content:
monseasd 发表于 2019-3-1 23:13
2080ti警告
8路泰坦xp警告

replies.author: 梦江南
replies.txt_content: 显卡真有去研究，对于我来说差不多，哈哈????

replies.author: StarTrek
replies.txt_content: 倒是A卡便宜。RX5802048P得了

replies.author: 夏夜的风w
replies.txt_content: 没开过  配置渣

replies.author: A_oooo
replies.txt_content: 越贵越好 哈哈哈哈

replies.author: ljh221
replies.txt_content: A卡性价比高，不过真香

replies.author: ZHOURoman
replies.txt_content: 2080ti吧，挺不错的

replies.author: LittleHei
replies.txt_content: 大差不差，其实没有多大区别的。

replies.author: wsth001
replies.txt_content: 只有我这种疯子才会R卡开光影吗。。？？？！！！？？？

replies.author: 一手汗
replies.txt_content:
N卡不是兼容性高吗233
不懂显卡这一块

replies.author: m13993764860_1
replies.txt_content: 只用过n卡  ，所以xjb推荐 n卡
AMD，YES！

replies.author: efsg_
replies.txt_content: a卡音质好，n卡网速快，多人开光影用n卡，反之同理

replies.author: 不给
replies.txt_content: 能用就行了

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content: 玩游戏还是N卡吧  比如暮色森林MOD加了后 A卡就只有1Fps

replies.author: 寒江独钓
replies.txt_content: 我这电脑i7 8550u，8g，可惜显卡是940MX……

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
我不是水笔 发表于 2019-3-3 13:22
a卡音质好，n卡网速快，多人开光影用n卡，反之同理
N卡偷U A卡偷电 I卡偷内存

replies.author: 苏墨寒
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 炫宙菌
replies.txt_content: 贫穷限制了我的想象力

replies.author: MC_tingfeng
replies.txt_content: 当然是N卡啦，N卡对光影的支持要好一些
